name: Pipe of Insight
description: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

abilities.name: Barrier
abilities.description: Grants nearby allied units and buildings a magical damage barrier for a while.
notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
Affects all allied units, including buildings and invulnerable allies
Does not affect wards and hidden units
Grants a magical damage barrier that absorbs magical damage values
Stacks additively with the same damage-type barrier sources
Has a higher priority than universal damage barriers
When combined with other damage-negating sources, Barrier does not absorb any damage until the damage-negation sources expire
Successive casts refresh the buff and reset the damage barrier capacity

abilities.name: Insight Aura
abilities.description: Increases the health regeneration and magic resistance of nearby allies.
notes: Can regenerate up to 150 health in one minute
Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources
Increases most heroes' magic resistance to 31%
With the magic resistance bonus from this source, every 10 points of intelligence further increases the total magic resistance by 0.92%

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources
With Insight Aura, the item grants a total of 16.5 health regeneration bonus to its wielder
Increases the wielder's magic resistance to 44.8%
Every 10 points of intelligence further increases the total magic resistance by 0.736% for the wielder
